participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, she often contemplates her future and values her possessions deeply, especially her cat.
participant_1.background: I would not be able to be a pharmacist if I were blind because I would not be able to read the labels on the medication bottles. I go to a catholic high school in New England. I am afraid of failing to reach my full potential. I like to sleep in, but my favorite time of day is sunset. My cat is my most prized possession.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and ambitious, he has a keen interest in racing and enjoys sharing his hobbies with family.
participant_2.background: I'm always building models of sports cars, so I guess racing is my favorite sport. I went to Sicily to visit the real-life locations of The Godfather. I enjoy playing soccer with my nieces and nephews. I will graduate from college in two years. I'm passionate about my career and I want to be the best I can be.

content.text: What's your favorite time of day?
I like the early evening, it's peaceful and quiet.
I like sunset too. Do you have any pets?
I have a dog and a cat.
The dog is named Rex and the cat is named Mittens.
What do you do for fun?
I love to build things, especially model cars.
It is! I'm always trying to improve my skills.
What do you want to do after college?
I want to be a race car driver.
Thanks! I'm really passionate about it.
